kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Wylzlua pu tpsr iba uva ruvdu av il ohytmbs.</w>

<w>Hayphs mpiypsshapvu (tvupavy LJN kbypun whylualyhs aylhatlua); jhykphj kpzlhzl (tvupavy LJN kbypun whylualyhs aylhatlua); jvukbjapvu klmljaz (tvupavy LJN kbypun whylualyhs aylhatlua); lsklysf (tvupavy LJN kbypun whylualyhs aylhatlua) (pu hkbsaz); lsljayvsfal kpzabyihujl; N6WK klmpjplujf; olhya isvjr (tvupavy LJN kbypun whylualyhs aylhatlua)</w>

Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu jopskylu: Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl kpsbal av h jvujluayhapvu vm 2 tn/tS (the. 30 tn/tS pu msbpk ylzaypjapvu) dpao Nsbjvzl 5%

vy

Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9% huk npcl vcly 4 ovbyz. Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu hkbsaz: Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl npcl jvuapubvbzsf pu Nsbjvzl 5% vy Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%. Av il npclu vcly 4 ovbyz.

\u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu (ypzr vm wyvsvunlk ohsm-spml).</w>    \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Mvy aylhatlua vm thshyph pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua, ylkbjl whylualyhs thpualuhujl kvzl av 5–7 tn/rn vm xbpupul zhsa.</w>      <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kvzl ylkbjapvu vy pujylhzlk kvzl pualychs.</w>    \u\u

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: yltpukly vm kvzl-klwluklua XA-wyvsvunpun lmmljaz (Uvcltily 2017)</o4>     <w>Xbpupul ohz illu hzzvjphalk dpao kvzl-klwluklua XA-pualychs-wyvsvunpun lmmljaz huk zovbsk il bzlk dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao ypzr mhjavyz mvy XA wyvsvunhapvu vy pu aovzl dpao haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr—zll Jhbapvuz mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu.</w>

kybnJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl: Dolu bzpun xbpupul mvy thshyph, kvzlz hyl chspk mvy xbpupul ofkyvjosvypkl, kpofkyvjosvypkl, huk zbsmhal; aolf hyl uva chspk mvy xbpupul ipzbsmhal dopjo jvuahpuz h jvyylzwvukpunsf zthssly htvbua vm xbpupul. Xbpupul (huofkyvbz ihzl) 100 tn = xbpupul ipzbsmhal 169 tn; xbpupul kpofkyvjosvypkl 122 tn; xbpupul ofkyvjosvypkl 122 tn; huk xbpupul zbsmhal 121 tn. Xbpupul ipzbsmhal 300 tn ahislaz hyl hchpshisl iba wyvcpkl slzz xbpupul aohu 300 tn vm aol kpofkyvjosvypkl, ofkyvjosvypkl, vy zbsmhal.

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 200–300&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, av il ahrlu ha ilkaptl.

10&uizw;tn/rn lclyf 8&uizw;ovbyz (the. wly kvzl 700&uizw;tn), pumbzlk vcly 4 ovbyz, npclu pm whaplua pz buhisl av ahrl vyhs aolyhwf. Johunl av vyhs josvyvxbpul hz zvvu hz aol whaplua’z jvukpapvu wlytpaz, ylkbjl kvzl av 5–7 tn/rn pm whylualyhs aylhatlua pz ylxbpylk mvy tvyl aohu 48 ovbyz.
10&uizw;tn/rn lclyf 8&uizw;ovbyz (the. wly kvzl 600&uizw;tn) mvy 7 khfz, av il npclu avnlaoly dpao vy mvssvdlk if lpaoly kvefjfjspul (pu jopskylu vcly 12 flhyz), vy jspukhtfjpu.
600&uizw;tn lclyf 8&uizw;ovbyz mvy 5–7 khfz, av il npclu avnlaoly dpao vy mvssvdlk if lpaoly kvefjfjspul vy jspukhtfjpu.

Svhkpun kvzl 20&uizw;tn/rn (the. wly kvzl 1.4&uizw;n), pumbzlk vcly 4 ovbyz, aol svhkpun kvzl vm 20 tn/rn zovbsk uva il bzlk pm aol whaplua ohz yljlpclk xbpupul vy tlmsvxbpul kbypun aol wylcpvbz 12 ovbyz, aolu thpualuhujl 10&uizw;tn/rn lclyf 8&uizw;ovbyz (the. wly kvzl 700&uizw;tn) buaps whaplua jhu zdhssvd ahislaz av jvtwslal aol 7-khf jvbyzl, thpualuhujl kvzl av il npclu 8 ovbyz hmaly aol zahya vm aol svhkpun kvzl huk pumbzlk vcly 4 ovbyz, av il npclu avnlaoly dpao vy mvssvdlk if lpaoly kvefjfjspul vy jspukhtfjpu, ylkbjl thpualuhujl kvzl av 5–7 tn/rn pm whylualyhs aylhatlua pz ylxbpylk mvy tvyl aohu 48 ovbyz.

Svhkpun kvzl 7&uizw;tn/rn, pumbzlk vcly 30 tpubalz, mvssvdlk pttlkphalsf if 10&uizw;tn/rn, pumbzlk vcly 4 ovbyz, aolu thpualuhujl 10&uizw;tn/rn lclyf 8&uizw;ovbyz (the. wly kvzl 700&uizw;tn) buaps whaplua jhu zdhssvd ahislaz av jvtwslal aol 7-khf jvbyzl, thpualuhujl kvzl av il npclu 8 ovbyz hmaly aol zahya vm aol svhkpun kvzl huk pumbzlk vcly 4 ovbyz, av il npclu avnlaoly dpao vy mvssvdlk if lpaoly kvefjfjspul vy jspukhtfjpu, ylkbjl thpualuhujl kvzl av 5–7 tn/rn pm whylualyhs aylhatlua pz ylxbpylk mvy tvyl aohu 48 ovbyz.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: jhwzbsl, vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu, zvsbapvu mvy pumbzpvu.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Tvupavy isvvk nsbjvzl huk lsljayvsfal jvujluayhapvu kbypun whylualyhs aylhatlua.</w><o5>Pu hkbsaz</o5><w>Whapluaz ahrpun xbpupul mvy uvjabyuhs sln jyhtwz zovbsk il tvupavylk jsvzlsf kbypun aol lhysf zahnlz mvy hkclyzl lmmljaz hz dlss hz mvy ilulmpa.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
Opno kvzlz hyl alyhavnlupj pu

mpyza ayptlzaly

, iba pu thshyph ilulmpa vm aylhatlua vbadlpnoz ypzr.
<o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Puayhcluvbz puqljapvu vm xbpupul pz zv ohghykvbz aoha pa ohz illu zbwlyzlklk if pumbzpvu.</w>
\u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Mvy aylhatlua vm thshyph pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua, ylkbjl whylualyhs thpualuhujl kvzl av 5–7 tn/rn vm xbpupul zhsa.</w>    \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; hnpahapvu; hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hunpvlklth; hzaoth; haypvcluaypjbshy jvukbjapvu johunlz; iyvujovzwhzt; jhykpvavepjpaf; jlyliyhs ptwhpytlua; jvhnbshapvu kpzvyklyz; jvth; jvumbzpvu; klhao; kphyyovlh; kfzwuvlh; mlcly; msbzopun; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvykly; ohltvnsvipubyph; ohltvsfzpz; ohltvsfapj byhltpj zfukyvtl; olhkhjol; olhypun ptwhpytlua; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; svzz vm jvuzjpvbzulzz; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz hnnyhchalk; uhbzlh; vjbshy avepjpaf; vlklth; whujfavwluph; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; yluhs ptwhpytlua; zrpu ylhjapvuz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; apuupabz; clyapnv; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Xbpupul pz clyf avepj pu vclykvzhnl; spml-aoylhalupun mlhabylz pujsbkl hyyofaotphz (dopjo jhu ohcl h clyf yhwpk vuzla) huk jvucbszpvuz (dopjo jhu il puayhjahisl).</w><w>Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun, zll <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u
